headline.main: Pennsylvania Levels $3.5 Million Fine Against Gas Driller
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania Levels $3.5 Million Fine Against Gas Driller

docs.snippet: Pennsylvania environmental regulators have fined a natural-gas driller more than $3.5 million for violations at 10 well sites and six pipeline locations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pennsylvania environmental regulators have fined a natural-gas driller more than $3.5 million for violations at 10 well sites and six pipeline locations.

headline.main: UN Scrambling for Land to Shelter Displaced Outside Mosul
headline.print_headline: UN Scrambling for Land to Shelter Displaced Outside Mosul

docs.snippet: The U.N. is scrambling to find enough land to shelter those displaced by the fighting to retake Mosul from the Islamic State group as humanitarians brace for the exodus of as many as 700,000 people from the city, an official said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N. is scrambling to find enough land to shelter those displaced by the fighting to retake Mosul from the Islamic State group as humanitarians brace for the exodus of as many as 700,000 people from the city, an official said.

headline.main: Black Employees File Discrimination Suit Against CNN, Turner
headline.print_headline: Black Employees File Discrimination Suit Against CNN, Turner

docs.snippet: Current and former black employees of Time Warner, owner of Turner networks including CNN, TNT and TBS, have filed a class-action racial discrimination suit against the company....
docs.lead_paragraph: Current and former black employees of Time Warner, owner of Turner networks including CNN, TNT and TBS, have filed a class-action racial discrimination suit against the company.

headline.main: New-Look Spurs Still Piling Up the Wins Aplenty
headline.print_headline: New-Look Spurs Still Piling Up the Wins Aplenty

docs.snippet: For so many years, the San Antonio Spurs have been defined by their consistency, an unprecedented level of stability that has brought five championships and established the organization as a model franchise in professional sports....
docs.lead_paragraph: For so many years, the San Antonio Spurs have been defined by their consistency, an unprecedented level of stability that has brought five championships and established the organization as a model franchise in professional sports.

headline.main: Court Blocks New York City From Discarding Illegal Immigrants' Data
headline.print_headline: Court Blocks New York City From Discarding Illegal Immigrants' Data

docs.snippet: A New York state court on Tuesday temporarily stopped New York City from destroying the personal records of hundreds of thousands of municipal I.D. card holders after Republicans argued the records might be needed to track criminals....
docs.lead_paragraph: A New York state court on Tuesday temporarily stopped New York City from destroying the personal records of hundreds of thousands of municipal I.D. card holders after Republicans argued the records might be needed to track criminals.
